display_long_description:
# Catastrophe has struck the prehistoric world.

As a new cadet of the time-traveling Paleoguard, your mission is to raise baby dinosaurs into powerful adults with thriving herds, while restoring their habitats.

**What some of XR's top Content Creators are saying about Dino Hab:**

- Featured in Nathie's Top 25 Best Mixed Reality Games on Meta Quest 3 and 3S list. "The game has a super addictive progression system" - Nathie
- "A cozy family-friendly game that feels like a mix of exploring, learning and just spending time with adorable dinosaurs." - Cas and Chary XR
- "This dinosaur game is unreal!" "It's an educational game as well as being super fun and cute" - OtterWorldly


[media]

**Nurture Your Dinosaurs**

Raise baby dinosaurs from hatchlings to towering adults.

[media]

**Manage Habitats**

Build evolving habitats for your dinosaurs while adapting to challenges like storms and volcanic eruptions


[media]

**Unlock Rewards and New Ecosystems**

Your progress will earn you rewards and unlock new habitats. 3 full habitats are included with their own dinosaurs, climate, flora, fauna, fungi, and more.

[media]

As a new cadet of the time-traveling Paleoguard, your mission is to raise baby dinosaurs into powerful adults with thriving herds, while restoring their habitats.

**What some of XR's top Content Creators are saying about Dino Hab:**

**Nurture Your Dinosaurs**

Raise baby dinosaurs from hatchlings to towering adults.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/428956658_556128157267222_3286284237364900206_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WgHE1x9M88gQ7kNvwHSaD8h&_nc_oc=Adn5eNW7fM1REhnhXLQSwjohtkpxRTgaNJM6jNIj20kAFdF65YsPVFjs49h8U8PAR4c&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=rW-eyQ6B1iyl3rIIJUUUfw&oh=00_AfFBPHBLL5SyRTe55C1wsEsVf4gtZMNUO7x6naghDdNftg&oe=67FFF114)

**Manage Habitats**

Build evolving habitats for your dinosaurs while adapting to challenges like storms and volcanic eruptions

**Unlock Rewards and New Ecosystems**

Your progress will earn you rewards and unlock new habitats. 3 full habitats are included with their own dinosaurs, climate, flora, fauna, fungi, and more.
